casebody.data:
BERRY
v.
NC DEPT. OF CORRECTION. No. 349P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. James Peeler Smith, Special Counsel, for NC Dept. of Correction.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of July 2008 by Plaintiff for Motion of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
